response:
"warum gibt es immer noch firmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the fact that many companies still collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it raises the question of why this is still happening and calls for better protection of personal information. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #security (security) are used to reach a wider audience and make the post more discoverable by people interested in these topics.
